classic.title: Classic
classic.description: A classic plinko board, with a diagonally aligned lattice of pegs over a row of goals.

square.title: Lattice
square.description: A vertically aligned lattice of pegs over a row of goals.

1helix.title: Helix
1helix.description: A helix rotating over a row of goals.

4helix.title: Helixes
4helix.description: Four helixes rotating over a row of goals.

wheel.title: Thresher
wheel.description: Concentric rings of pegs rotating over a row of goals.

vortex.title: Whirlpools
vortex.description: Four eddies of pegs rotating over a row of goals.
